zone.line: the uneasiness I have unavoidably given
you: but while in that unhappy island,
where every ^thing breathes her spirit whom
I have lost for ever, a spell held me.
It is broken: I have quitted England for
many years, perhaps for ever. But to
convince you that I selfish feeling does
not entirely engross me I shall remain in
this town untill you have made by letter
every arrangement with me that you
judge necessary. When I leave this place
do not expect to hear from me: I must
break all ties that at present exist.
I shall become a wanderer, a misera
ble out cast – alone! alone!" – In
another part of the letter he men
tioned me – "As for that unhappy
little being whom I could not see, and
hardly dare mention, I leave her
under your protection. Take care of her
and cherish her: one day I may claim
her at your hands; but futurity is dark,
make the present happy to her."
My father remained three months
